meta.title: Billions Intelligence - AI-Powered Investment Decisions, Data-Driven Financial Future
meta.description: Billions Intelligence provides you with the most timely and comprehensive financial data services, making investment decisions smarter and more precise

home.heroTitle: AI-Powered Investment Decisions, Data-Driven Financial Future
home.heroDescription: Billions Intelligence provides you with the most timely and comprehensive financial data services, making investment decisions smarter and more precise
home.intelligentQADesc: Advanced deep learning-based intelligent financial Q&A system, providing 7×24 hour professional and accurate answers to all finance-related questions.
home.documentTranslationDesc: Professional financial document translation services supporting multiple languages, ensuring accuracy of technical terms for seamless global communication.
home.meetingMinutesDesc: Intelligent meeting minutes generation system that automatically identifies key information and provides real-time summaries to enhance decision-making efficiency.
home.financialBigDataDesc: Comprehensive coverage of domestic and international market data. Domestic data includes macroeconomic indicators, industry analysis, A-shares/Hong Kong stocks. International data primarily covers US stocks, institutional meeting minutes (including buy-side analyst conference call transcripts), SEC filings, etc.
home.news1: 2025-10-31 Billions Intelligence Launches New Generation AI Investment Research Platform
home.news2: 2025-09-15 Billions Intelligence Releases Beta Version of AI Investment Research Platform
home.news3: Successfully hosted 2024 FinTech Summit and released industry white paper

xuXiaoBo.name: Xu Xiaobo
xuXiaoBo.title: Chairman & Founder
xuXiaoBo.description: Dual degree in Physics and Economics from Peking University, CFA Level II. Won first place in the National High School Physics Competition Finals. Joined Citadel, a renowned US hedge fund, in 2012 to develop and research quantitative trading strategies, with his team achieving daily US stock trading volume of $10 billion
